property.name: Keywords
property.value: Headline (Only one Headline may be played per shootout).

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Each dude in your posse gets +1 bullets. After each time any dude is aced as a casualty, the shooter in the other posse permanently gets 1 control point. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job: Mark a wanted dude with at least 2 bounty. If successful, ace that dude and your leader gains 1 Control Point.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After the Mark accepts your callout (but before posses are formed), boot your Leader, or their attached horse, to move both dudes to any adjacent location that is not your home. Boot the Mark.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Look at another player's play hand. If that player has revealed an illegal hand this turn, you may choose and discard one action, goods or spell card in it without a cheatin' ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Choose a booted dude at their home and attach this card to them. While this card is attached this dude has -1 bullet, -1 influence, -3 value and the ability "Noon, boot: remove one attached [It's getting worse]."

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Ace a card in your discard pile to gain 3 GR and draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin' Resolution: Choose up to 2 dudes and move them home. If this is a shootout you may boot them. If you revealed a legal hand you may choose up to 3 dudes instead.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Event (Only one [Event] may be played per shootout).

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: All dudes in one posse get -1 Bullet. Any dude in the shootout with 1 Bullet or less becomes a Draw.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time a resolution ability is used, the controller gains 1 Ghost Rock. Controller Noon, Boot: If you played a cheatin' resolution this turn, Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time a resolution ability on an action card is used, the controller gains 1 Ghost Rock. Controller Noon, Boot: If you played a cheatin' resolution this turn, Draw a card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Private-Ranch-Gadget-Difficulty 7

property.name: Text
property.value: This deed must be invented by an Mad Scientist in-town, like any other gadget. It enters play like any other in-town deed. Controller Noon, Boot: Gain 1 Ghost Rock.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Private-Strike-Out of Town

property.name: Text
property.value: During upkeep, put enough Ghost Rock counters on this deed to bring it to 2 counters. The controller may use Ghost Rock counters on this deed to pay for abilities on gadgets.

property.name: Text
property.value: If your outfit is the Law Dogs, you may start with this deed in play, and reduce your starting posse by 1. Controller React, Boot: When a wanted dude is discarded from during high noon, this deed gains a permanent CP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Shootout, Boot: Put a 2-stud Gunslinger token into play under your control at a shootout in this or an adjacent deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller React, Boot, Pay 2 GR: After you invent a gadget, unboot the Mad Scientist who invented it. Controller React, Boot: After you pull a club due to an Experimental card, ignore the result, and pull again

property.name: Text
property.value: All the controller's dudes in this or an adjacent location, with a value of 10 or higher, have -1 upkeep.

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude has +1 influence while they are not wanted. Noon, Boot: If this dude is unbooted, call out a wanted dude at this location. If this dude is a deputy they do not become wanted for joining a posse at a private location.

property.name: Text
property.value: This deed is now Government Deputies at this deed have +2 Influence and +3 Value

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Boot: Boot this dude to give them +1 bullet and make them a stud.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gadget Difficulty 7

property.name: Text
property.value: If this dude is a Gadget, reduce their upkeep by 1. You may use Ghost Rock on this card to pay for abilities on any gadgets at this location. React, Boot: After this dude moves, put one ghost rock on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: If there is an unbooted non-Melee Weapon in the opposing posse, this weapon provides no bullet bonus. This dude has +3 Value Shootout, Boot: Unboot a spell attached to this dude. You may use it another time this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: React,Boot: Before a shootout ability resolves to make a dude join this shootout, or go home booted. Cancel that ability.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Weapon-Experimental-Gadget-Difficulty 6

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Boot: Make a pull. If the pull is a club, discard this dude, else discard an opposing dude with value equal or lower than this dude's bullets.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Improvement-Gadget-Difficulty 10

property.name: Text
property.value: After this gadget is invented, attach it to an in-town deed you own and control. Controller Noon, Boot: If your hand is below your maximum hand size, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: +3 Value Shotoout, Boot: Move this dude into the shootout. You may boot a dude in the opposing posse. While this dude has a Melee weapon attached, they have +1 bullet

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mystical-Weapon-Gadget-Difficulty 2

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: When this dude is aced or discarded during a shootout, send one dude in this shootout home booted and draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: '+1 value While the opposing posse in this shootout has an unbooted non-Melee weapon, the longsword provides no bullet bonus.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin' Resolution, Boot: Put one Abomination from your discard or boot hill with a cost equal to, or lower than, the cheatin' hand rank into play at this location at no cost. If this is during a shootout resolution, they join your posse immediately.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Experimental-Gadget-Difficulty 8

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude is considered an Abomination React: When this dude is aced in a shootout, discard them instead. Noon, Repeat, Pay 2 GR, Pull: If the pull is a clubs discard this dude, otherwise unboot them.

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude's influence cannot be reduced via an opponent's abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Miracle 6, Boot: A dude in this or an adjacent location gains bounty equal to this dude's blessed skill. Noon Miracle 7, Boot: Take one bounty from a dude at this or an adjacent location into your bank.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Miracle 7, Boot: Reduce your casualties this round by 1. No dude may be aced or discarded, except as a casualty for losing a round of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Hex 9, Boot: Boot all other unbooted dudes in this shootout

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin Resolution Miracle 7: One of your dudes gains +2 bullets and +2 influence and becomes a stud until the end of the turn. If this is a shootout, reduce your casualties by 3.

card.name: For Such a Time as This

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job Miracle 9, Boot: Mark the Town Square. If Successful, search through your deck and/or discard pile for a dude whose Grit is less than the skill test result. Put that dude into play, reducing their cost by 4 and give them a permanent +1 influence. Ace this card

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Miracle 7: Choose a dude with a Mêlée weapon. They have +2 bullets, become a stud and cannot be affected by opposing spells, while that weapon remains attached to them (until the end of the turn).

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot attach Weapons After each shootout play, if you have more cards in your hand than each other player (individually), this dude becomes a stud. Otherwise this dude becomes a draw.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Experienced 1

property.name: Text
property.value: If Max is in the Town Square or at a Government deed, ranches do not provide control points. Noon, Boot: Bring a dude with a value of 10 or higher into play at Max's location reducing their cost by 3 ghost rock.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 3-Experienced 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Unboot a hex in this or an adjacent location. Its abilities may be used an additional time this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude gains +1 bullets if they have a Weapon attached. This dude gain +1 Influence if they have an Attire attached. This dude has -1 Upkeep if they have a Horse attached.

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude becomes a Stud when she joins the Mark's posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: While at an Out of Town deed, this dude is worth 1 CP Any deed this dude is at has its production reduced to 0 Noon, boot: Choose a dude at this deed, reduce their influence to 0 until after the next upkeep phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot a melee weapon attached to [this dude) to make him a Stud and gain +2 Bullets (to a maximum of 4).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Choose another player's dude at a deed they do not own. Gain ghost rock equal to their bounty.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Deputy-Experienced 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon job, boot: Mark an opposing wanted dude. If a shootout occurs, a 2-stud Gunslinger Token enters play and joins your posse. If successful, discard the target dude.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Blessed 1

property.name: Text
property.value: If [Gideon] is in a posse on his own he gets +1 Bullet for each dude in the opposing posse.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Grifter-Deputy-Blessed 0

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: At the start of the game, discard a card, draw a card and add one bounty to another player's dude.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Blessed 0

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After an opposing player's card affects your dude at this or an adjacent location, you may add a bounty to a dude who is not wanted.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 0-Grifter

property.name: Text
property.value: React: At the start of the game, reveal your play hand. If there are no deeds in your play hand, discard the top 10 cards from you deck. You may discard a card in your hand to choose a Ranch or Improvement from your discard pile and put it in your hand.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Look at a number of random cards in an opponent's hand equal to this dude's bullet value. You may discard one reveled action card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist:3-Experienced 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Boot: Boot Elander to unboot a gadget in your posse. It can use any printed abilities another time this turn. If it's Experimental, you may unboot Elander. If it's a Weapon, it provides an extra +1 Bullets and the dude holding it becomes a stud.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 2

property.name: Text
property.value: Repeat Noon, Pull, Pay 1 GR: Louis makes a Mad Scientist skill check against a value of 10. If successful, you may unboot one your dudes at an in-town location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: When one of you dudes is being aced, discarded or sent home booted as a shootout play, send him home booted instead. This Dude joins your posse (moving if necessary).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 0

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude has +1 Influence if they have 2 spells attached Shootout: If this has a mystical goods attached, they become a stud.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever an opposing dude refuses a call-out from this dude, their influence is reduced to 0 until after Sundown.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Harrowed-Huckster 1-Experienced 1

property.name: Text
property.value: If this dude comes into play by experiencing an existing Alvie Cline, you may boot a dude in play and gain 1 ghost rock. Noon, Boot: If Avie is at an in-town deed, choose an opposing dude with lower influence at an in-town location. Move them to Avie’s location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: React: When this dude enters play, you may search your deck and/or discard pile for a non-gadget mystical goods and either attach it to one of your dudes in this location, paying all costs or ace it.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Abomination-Huckster 1-Grifter

property.name: Text
property.value: React, boot: At the start of the game, ace this dude to search your deck for a hex and put it into your hand. Discard a card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Experienced 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: If this dude has a Melee Weapon attached, he is a stud.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot a spell on this dude to call-out a dude with higher bullet rating than this dude's. This call out cannot be refused.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 0

property.name: Text
property.value: During shootouts this dude is in, if you pull a club as part of a huckster skill check, add 3 to its value.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude may have two weapons equipped

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot attach weapons. While Harry is in Town Square and you have more influence in it than any other player, it is considered a location that you control
